title: Implement Dashboard layout
description:
Dashboard with header and account selector.

## Layout
- Header with Agatha logo, account dropdown, logout
- Main content area for analysis results
- Sidebar (optional) for navigation

## Account Selector
```tsx
<Select onValueChange={setSelectedAccount}>
  <SelectTrigger>
    <SelectValue placeholder="Select account" />
  </SelectTrigger>
  <SelectContent>
    <SelectItem value="tl">ThirdLove (TL)</SelectItem>
    <SelectItem value="wh">Whispering Homes (WH)</SelectItem>
  </SelectContent>
</Select>
```

## Demo Flow
1. Show account dropdown with TL, WH
2. "Analyze" button triggers /api/analyze
3. Results appear in main content
